posts.post_content:
A couple of decent Manning Batting cards up for grabs.  Bought a run from Erick (T206hound) and these two are surplus in my collection.  Prices include S/H in bubble mailer.  PayPal F&F preferred (mcantista@juno.com), cash or check.  Please PM me with interest/questions.  Thanks, Mike.

Manning P150 - vibrant colors, creasing, corner wear - $20
[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/T206%20Highlanders/fotoflexer_photo_zps1df733dc.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/T206%20Highlanders/fotoflexer_photo_zps66cf3fe4.jpg[/IMG]

Manning SC150 - decent colors, creasing, corner wear - $20 SOLD
[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/T206%20Highlanders/fotoflexer_photo_zpsa9dd95d6.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/T206%20Highlanders/fotoflexer_photo_zps5bd278ec.jpg[/IMG]
I'll take the Sweet Cap.  PM to follow.
